data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of A B Infrabuild Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from November 08, 2024, the equity shares of A B Infrabuild Ltd (Scrip Code: 544281) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of ''T'' Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20241106-46 dated November 06, 2024.
